forum.content:
There's a door
When I enter
It takes me to the future
When I enter
I'm just like a dreamer
Swim in the water
Go farther and farther
And be an alive actor

Beat off every challenger
Join in every adventure
Hang out with various strangers
But ignore the life timer
Because thou is not a perfect time manager

To be a sophisticated teacher
But not an arrogant professor
Everyone is the ones' story maker
Everyone is a history editor
Everyone is an alive actor

Now l beg you to close the door
Stop reveling in being a daydreamer
And move on to your mystic future
forum.title: 《Imagination》(分享此假文青的詩( ´_ゝ`)
